name: Treasure Blast
description:
Tap 2 or more block of same color to blast.
Blast more blocks to create special block.
Experience the variant stages and effects of the special blocks!

[Features]
- Combination of thrilling Blast and brain puzzle game
- no play limit such as Heart, play as much as you can!
- can play even without internet!
- can play even in AIRPLANE mode!
- game file is as low as 20M, light-weight download!
- supports tablet screen
- supports 14 languages


Homepage:
